attributes.action: Exercise greater control over more extreme parties like the BNP.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister should be more cautious of more extreme parties such as the BNP and keep tabs on their activities. It would be undemocratic to ban them and would only force them underground, but they should not be ignored and their rather questionable behaviour should be more closely monitored.
